title: Episode #353:  You Never Forget Your First Runoff
description:
Georgia will be experiencing two Senate runoffs next month. Back in 1992, Senator Wyche Fowler was forced into a runoff of his own -- where he lost his seat. Fowler offers similarities and differences between now and then.

The post Episode #353: You Never Forget Your First Runoff appeared first on Ken Rudin's Political Junkie.
itunes:subtitle: Georgia will be experiencing two Senate runoffs next month.  Back in 1992, Senator Wyche Fowler was forced into a runoff of his own -- where he lost his seat.  Fowler offers similarities and differences between now and then.
itunes:summary:
Both political parties are focusing on the two Senate runoffs in Georgia on January 5th.  Wyche Fowler, a Georgia Democrat elected to the Senate in 1986, nearly won re-election in 1992 but because he fell a tad below the required 50 percent, he was forced into a runoff three weeks later … and he lost.  Fowler is on the Political Junkie this week with memories of that time, and offers differences and similarities to what is happening today.
Music in this week’s episode:
Particle Man by They Might Be Giants
The Times They Are A-Changin’ by Bob Dylan
itunes:author: Ken Rudin
itunes:title: You Never Forget Your First Runoff
